dialogues.text: Morgan WHIRLS as Eli's BLAST THROUGH THE CEILING sends CH of the STATION'S ROOF SPEWING SKYWARD like a geyser -- What. The. Fuck. Was. That.

dialogues.speaker: MORGAN
dialogues.text: Tell me we've got backup coming --

dialogues.speaker: NEARBY OFFICER
dialogues.text: ETA's two/three minutes --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eli, with the silence having spread -- chances a glance - -- A HAND REACHES. GRABS HIM -- YANKS him down behind cov of a short cubicle WALL -- It's Jimmy. Who's pulled Eli into cover just as -- the GU who was covering the front entrance -- APPEARS at the END

dialogues.speaker: THE HALLWAY BEYOND
dialogues.text: -- what looks like an AR-15 -- BRBRBRRBKAKAKAKAKAKAKAAK - Both of them cover. Scared. As lead BURNS PAST. Jimmy tak stock of what Eli just did to save him...

dialogues.speaker: JIMMY
dialogues.text: You okay?  109. Eli manages a nod. Brave.

dialogues.speaker: ELI
dialogues.text: Are you? Jimmy... motions to the GUNMAN. Still a ways up that hall

dialogues.speaker: JIMMY
dialogues.text: I can. Uh. Give you some cover -- Eli nods again, and Jimmy drops low, scurries left. LEANS

dialogues.speaker: JIMMY
dialogues.text: Hey! Yo! FIRE RETURNS on Jimmy, giving Eli the chance to drop RIGH BLLAAAAAAAAM! Eli sends a BLAST down the corridor -- it EXPLODES into CHUNKY DEBRIS, but RETURN FIRE sounds back second later -- he’s still up there -- well covered -- Eli tries again -- BLLAAAAAAAAM! Still no good --

dialogues.speaker: ELI
dialogues.text: I’m trying -- BRBRBRBAKAKAKAKAKAKK -- automatic FIRE POUNDS PAST overhe Eli and Jimmy COVER -- BRBRBRBRKAKAKAKAK --

dialogues.speaker: JIMMY
dialogues.text: He’s yours man -- take him out -- Then. Eli remembers The GREEN NODE. Lower left side of th barrel. Eli jostles the WEAPON, finds it -- KR-SHRRR-VRRRP. The WEAPON JOLTS in his hands and two sle appendages extend sideways like recoil dampeners once aga

dialogues.speaker: ELI
dialogues.text: Come on -- Eli, rallying -- RISES fast into view as down the hall, t LAST OF TAYLOR‘S GUNMEN SWINGS INTO VIEW -- AIMS -- Eli FIRES FIRST. Pulls the TRIGGER and THE WEAPON EXPLODE with BLUE LIGHT. AMASSING in a SURGE before --

dialogues.speaker: VVVVVVSSSSHHHHH
dialogues.text: EXPLODING forward in a tidal wave of BLUE ENERGY. Eli’s THROWN BACKWARD by the recoil as --  110. The ENTIRE HALLWAY around the remaining shooter IGNITES. BLASTING A HOLE STRAIGHT THROUGH the SIDE OF THE STATION beyond -- -- and silence. Jimmy turns. Pulls Eli to his feet. They exchange glances --

dialogues.speaker: JIMMY
dialogues.text: Have I seen that one yet? That was new, right?? Shit, Eli -- Eli, with the wind knocked out of him a little, nods. The entire station now beyond them QUIET. Taylor & Co. gone..

dialogues.speaker: JIMMY
dialogues.text: Keep low, alright? I’1l -- (looks up, around) -- go first I guess, just -- (re: the weapon) -- there could be more of em. Keep that thing handy -- maybe stick with the first mode, yeah?

dialogues.speaker: ELI
dialogues.text: Okay -- Eli taps the node until the WEAPON RETURNS to normal. Jim looks around again. The coast still clear, so. Jimmy move cautious, motions Eli along -- Making for the scorched hallway. Darkened now -- overhead lighting flickering inconsistently -- Eli sticks close at Jimmy's side, THE WEAPON ready -- the moment building -- forward --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BACKUP HAS ARRIVED. LOCAL PD now SWARMING into position around the station. OVER A DOZEN SQUAD CARS. Jumping in alongside Morgan and the TAC SQUAD. Armed and ready. So many POLICE the building is surrounded on ALL SIDES --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jimmy and Eli move in close formation through the afterma of Taylor's gunfight. We see both fallen cops AND members Taylor's crew. Motionless... Closing in on the FINAL TURN. We see dust and ash flutter through the air. The LOBBY and MAIN ENTRANCE just beyond  111.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jimmy chances a glance into the lobby now. And sees it. B and red lights. Flashing in through every window. Jimmy curses. Inches forward, low -- peaks a look out to see -- A PARKING LOT FILLED WITH COPS.

dialogues.speaker: JIMMY
dialogues.text: Ah man -- Jimmy turns. Sinks down along the wall. Face wracked. No clean exit. Beat. He looks to Eli. Face long -- OUTSIDE: and Jimmy can see them GEARING UP out there. Rea Morgan can be seen coordinating. Doling out ORDERS.

dialogues.speaker: JIMMY
dialogues.text: Looks like we’ll have more company pretty shortly...

dialogues.speaker: ELI
dialogues.text: What’re they gonna do? A long silence follows. Jimmy's expression far off and aw Then. He looks back at Eli and smiles, sad.

dialogues.speaker: JIMMY
dialogues.text: They're probably gonna come in here and take us away. Could be the last time we see each other for awhile -- Beat. Jimmy looks at Eli.

dialogues.speaker: JIMMY
dialogues.text: -- I'll go away for good. You'll be alone again. I’m sorry, I -- it was never meant to be like this. Dad was right. Be more like him, okay? (then) Less like me. Eli looks up at Jimmy. Quiet. And there we have it. Jimmy nods. Sober. Lays the pistol down. Like releasing s great weight. Slides it away. Looks at Eli. Silence linge

dialogues.speaker: JIMMY
dialogues.text: You and me’1l always be brothers. Like it or not. And I'll always be there for you. Best as I can. Okay?  112. Jimmy strains. Gets to his knees, puts his hands atop his head -- ready to be arrested. Eli sets down THE WEAPON nearby... gets on his knees...

dialogues.speaker: JIMMY
dialogues.text: They like it when you link your fingers. Just like this. (then) They'll be everywhere real soon. I want you to do everything they tell you, okay? Eli copies. Scared. Holding back tears.

dialogues.speaker: JIMMY
dialogues.text: Elijah. You’1l be fine. AND WE HOLD: on two brothers. Side by side. Listening to sound of BOOTS like a gathering storm outside --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Officers RACE up. From EVERY SIDE. GUNS DRAWN, SWARMING - and that’s when we hear it. STREET BIKES. In BREAKNECK approach. Coming right this wa Morgan, amidst the STORMING POLICE, turns --

dialogues.speaker: NEARBY OFFICER
dialogues.text: Ma’ am? OTHER POLICE look as well. Taking in the TWO HEADLIGHTS a they come SAILING IN. WAY TOO FAST AND -- It's THE CLEANERS. They DRAW WEAPONS. ONE PULLS and aims looks like a HANDGUN version of Eli’s WEAPON, FIRES -- BLASTING straight through BARRICADES. POLICE go LEAPING A BULLETS BOUNCE OFF their ADVANCED ARMOR -- IGNORING incom fire. Heading right for THE STATION --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jimmy hears this -- looks -- Eli too --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Morgan CHARGES. YELLS to POLICE --  113.

dialogues.speaker: MORGAN
dialogues.text: GO!! Hit the DOOR! Don’t let them past you into the STATION! Morgan and POLICE RUSH THE DOOR as OFFICERS BEHIND them attempt to SLOW the BIKES -- The SWAT BATTERING RAM SWINGS. FOOOSH. The SECOND CLEANER FIRES SOMETHING past Morgan. I the POLICE STATION'S MAIN WINDOW. A CANNISTER or --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eli and Jimmy watch as THE DOOR BUCKLES under the WEIGHT

dialogues.speaker: THE BATTERING RAM --
dialogues.text: -- as the GRENADE-SHAPED INCENDIARY ricochettes off the w beside Eli and --

dialogues.speaker: BLAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAM
dialogues.text: The PROJECTILE EXPLODES. Jimmy is HURLED straight backward by the BLAST -- The POL rushing in VANISH in BLINDING LIGHT -- As Eli’s form is CONSUMED BY SHOCKWAVE -- he cries out -- And halts. Nothing happens. Beat. His eyes still closed. Eli opens t Chances a look around.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not dead. The explosion didn't even scratch Eli. He turns FAST -- to JIMMY -- and goes wide eyed. Jimmy's just a few feet away. But he’s suspended in mid-a The gravity that should be tethering him to the floor gon As though the blast has hurled Jimmy backward in super sl motion -- Eli turns. The same can be said for the POLICE who just kicked the door in -- there’s Morgan -- also nearly froze Dust and debris flung by the blast hangs -- Time has frozen around Eli. He looks. Down at the explode grenade-like device at his feet. Spent. As though it's created some kind of force-field around just Eli. Eli PANICS. He turns -- fast. Grabs THE WEAPON --  114.

dialogues.speaker: ELI
dialogues.text: Hello? -- out the FRONT DOOR of the STATION. All of the POLICE OFFICERS outside FROZEN too. No one to answer -- silence For a moment, the sight of all this comes with a bewilder but very real sensation of awe -- and then -- MOVEMENT sounds behind Eli. He WHIRLS, takes FAST AIM at THE CLEANERS. Here in the station. Their WEAPONS drawn as they step int view. A standoff. Menacing -- Eli STAYS PUT -- terrified -- keeps his aim -- And here, as they approach -- we've got our best look at these two figures yet -- The FIRST CLEANER is TALLER and LEANER where the SECOND i STOCKIER with wide shoulders -- The TALLER CLEANER holds the silence. Takes stock of the small human boy in front of him. A David to Goliaths. And the FIRST CLEANER steps forward. Weapon up. Eli SWINGS the barrel of THE WEAPON at him. The TARGETING system LOCKS ON -- the weapon's power surging warning... «+. the Cleaner raises his hand in response. A gesture of calm -- wait -- we see the Taller Cleaner’s has five fingers. Reaching slowly to tap a small console his neck -- Eli watches -- AS THE TALLER CLEANER’S MECHANIZED HELMET RETRACTS. To reveal the face of a human. A man. A transparent breat apparatus wraps along his cheek into his nostrils -- aidi his breathing in our atmosphere.

dialogues.speaker: TALL CLEANER
dialogues.text: It's okay, son. Hang on, let's just talk a minute, alright? Eli's blanching at the sight of what's behind that mask - maintains his grip on the weapon -- fingers CLAMPED --

dialogues.speaker: TALL CLEANER
dialogues.text: Look. We’re not here to hurt you. (then)  115.

dialogues.speaker: TALL CLEANER, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: But that weapon -- we need it back. It doesn’t belong here -- Eli doesn’t waver -- gun still up. Overwhelmed, trembling Taking stock of the TALL CLEANER --

dialogues.speaker: ELI
dialogues.text: And what -- what happens to me when I give it to you?

dialogues.speaker: TALL CLEANER
dialogues.text: Look at your arm, Elijah. Eli slows at the mention of his name... Eli looks. This guy's pointing at Eli's scar.

dialogues.speaker: TALL CLEANER
dialogues.text: That's your activator. It’s the reason you’re able to operate that thing and no one else. (then, cautiously) Your parents made sure you got one before you left, so that some day you can return. And Eli stops.

dialogues.speaker: ELI
dialogues.text: My parents? The Cleaner sees the emotion he's gotten from this kid. T panic and the hope all at once -- A lot to take in. The Cleaner sees this, crosses closer.

dialogues.speaker: TALL CLEANER
dialogues.text: Your family have enemies -- the ones who located you here, who tracked you to that warehouse where you'd been salvaging -- (beat) We reached them before they got to you, but not quick enough apparently. The Tall Cleaner extends his hand now for THE WEAPON.

dialogues.speaker: TALL CLEANER
dialogues.text: Time dispersals are only temporary, and this one’s about to collapse. Sir. I’m gonna need you to hand it over now. We don't have long --  116.

dialogues.speaker: SECOND CLEANER
dialogues.text: (in perfect Chinese) Thirty seconds.

dialogues.speaker: TALL CLEANER
dialogues.text: (also in perfect Chinese) This is important. The Tall Cleaner motions. Eli turns, sees Jimmy -- still suspended mid-air -- but we can now see the faint traces MOVEMENT accelerating -- same with Morgan and the POLICE Eli looks from the frozen forms of storming police -- dow Studies THE WEAPON in his hand -- for the last time -- ha it over. His eyes still swimming --

dialogues.speaker: ELI
dialogues.text: But I don’t understand -- am I human?

dialogues.speaker: TALL CLEANER
dialogues.text: 100%. And from Earth. Just not this version. The SECOND CLEANER steps forward -- takes the weapon, sna it MAGNETICALLY onto his back --

dialogues.speaker: SECOND CLEANER
dialogues.text: We gotta move. The Tall Cleaner nods. Eyes Eli -- he can't just leave hi with that. So the Tall Cleaner acquiesces --

dialogues.speaker: TALL CLEANER
dialogues.text: We are at war, Elijah. An all too violent war that threatens more than you can imagine. And you're too important to be caught up in it right now. (beat) But just because you’re lonely, it doesn’t mean that you’re alone. You will see your parents again. They're counting on it. Then. Fateful.

dialogues.speaker: SECOND CLEANER
dialogues.text: And then you'll be giving us orders. The Cleaner offers his hand. A soldier's hand.  117. Eli accepts. Head-spun. Shakes it. The Tall Cleaner grins rises. Falls in with the SECOND -- -- who draws what looks like a MECHANIZED BATON -- ACTIVA it. The BATON SURGES. CRACKLING with LIGHT -- Eli RECOILS, watches -- sees his BREATH BEGIN TO FOG, the TEMPERATURE here dropping. FROST -- just like before -- GROWS in crystalline formations across every surface, the ceiling and floor -- -- slivers of tiny snow, condensation in the air freezing begin to fall -- leading Eli's gaze to JIMMY. Still flyin backwards in ultra slow-mo but now quickly ACCELERATING - The SECOND CLEANER WEAVES the baton through the air as th TRACING A DOORWAY -- the TALL CLEANER locks eyes with Eli

dialogues.speaker: TALL CLEANER
dialogues.text: Be seeing you. And what can only be described as a HOLE TORN OUT OF THIN ERUPTS INTO EXISTENCE. Unreal. A doorway to another world The Cleaners step through -- the DOORWAY COLLAPSES behind them. LIKE THAT -- they’re gone. And time rights itself. Jimmy SMACKS the floor, YELPS -- POLICE BREAK IN -- from EVERY ANGLE -- immediately and overwhelming -- YELLING ORDERS. Get down -- etc, etc -- Jimmy, on the floor, hands in the air -- yells back that and Eli are UNARMED. Eli’s knocked HARD to the ground. CU PULLING BACK. From Eli’s view -- everything changed. Morgan stands in view. Takes in the insanity of this scen The frost -- the carnage --

dialogues.speaker: MORGAN
dialogues.text: Clear the building! MOVE! -- and Eli at the center. No Cleaners. No weapon. Gone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eli sits in the back of an AMBULANCE. The scene of the shootout A FLURRY of ACTIVITY now -- -- every face betraying shock. Eli watches until --  118.

dialogues.speaker: MORGAN, (0.C.)
dialogues.text: I found the statement you were giving inside. Eli looks up briefly to see Morgan standing nearby.

dialogues.speaker: MORGAN
dialogues.text: Your brother seems to be matching it blow for blow. Morgan nods across the lot where Jimmy speaks to LOCAL CO

dialogues.speaker: MORGAN
dialogues.text: With the exception of a few things. Eli remains silent. Still in shock --

dialogues.speaker: MORGAN
dialogues.text: I'd say he’s covering for you. Morgan looks to Eli. He looks up at her. Contemplates tha

dialogues.speaker: MORGAN
dialogues.text: Which... I might just advise you to let him do, given you’re a minor and you've got your whole life ahead of you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eli slows. Digests that. Looks off to Jimmy --

dialogues.speaker: ELI
dialogues.text: What's gonna happen to my brother?

dialogues.speaker: MORGAN
dialogues.text: He’s gonna go away for a while. (beat) But if he keeps cooperating -- it might not be for as long as he thinks. Morgan holds. Looks at Eli a little more dire now --

dialogues.speaker: MORGAN
dialogues.text: As an incident on public record, you've managed to raise some eye- brows. Crazy looking weapons and men in armored suits vanishing into thin air... there are people who’re gonna want to talk to you. Eli remains quiet.  119.

dialogues.speaker: MORGAN
dialogues.text: But we can go over that later. For now, just sit tight -- Eli holds on this -- eyes Morgan as she rises, moves off. watches her go. And then sees -- -- Jimmy, still cuffed, is HOISTED to his feet. Lead away a detail of uniformed POLICE. Jimmy and Eli catch each other's eye. Jimmy nods. Juts hi chin as he goes. Still Jimmy. As he’s loaded into a CRUISER, Eli catches Jimmy's gaze, standing there -- ELI offers up that now-familiar all goo wink. Jimmy, across the lot -- grins WIDE, sends it back.

dialogues.speaker: ELI, (V.0.)
dialogues.text: You don't get to choose family.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jimmy, with his wrists still cuffed -- raises them into a little wave -- watches his little brother's figure recede into the faraway distance behind him --

dialogues.speaker: ELI, (V.0.)
dialogues.text: You don’t. Just cause someone is, it doesn’t mean they can’t hurt you. Doesn’t mean they won't.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eli looks -- out through the crowded lot -- just out.

dialogues.speaker: ELI, (V.0.)
dialogues.text: All you can do when it comes to the people you love is brace yourself. Across the face of the world he can see beyond. Our world Eyes traversing its contours as though feeling for what's beyond. For who. A light wind picks up.

dialogues.speaker: _ ELI, (V.0.)
dialogues.text: That's just how it is. And Eli holds... and we CUT TO BLACK.
